title: Desert Bloom", Resort style gated community in the heart of Summerlin 2bd 3ba
posting_body: ['Desert Bloom", Resort style gated community in the heart of Summerlin!', '2 story home with dual primary bedrooms.', 'Property features high end finishes throughout including vaulted ceilings, upgraded light fixtures & ceiling fans, new LED lights, two walk in closets with built in organizers, digital thermostats and solar screens, stainless steel kitchen appliances, recently painted exterior, custom mood lighting and a covered patio to enjoy the outdoors & desert landscaping.', 'Main living area has a luxurious modern fireplace and lots of natural light.', 'Spa like bathrooms have been remodeled with new fixtures, custom cabinetry and flooring.', 'Access to the Walking Trail/Paseo is across the street!', 'Great community pool, spa, clubhouse, and parks.', 'Close distance to shopping centers, 215 freeway, Red Rock Hotel, Downtown Summerlin, and more!']
